ComicInfo.Summary: The world of modern man is protected from the minions of the Underworld through barriers erected by the gods. Fiendus, the son of Hades, is plotting to release the Underworld on earth to corrupt the paths of the good and the righteous and amass power for the forces of evil. Zeus enlists five young Olympians, the sons and daughters of the ancient gods, to stop him. The Pantheon: Melanie-the Maker, Odysseus-God of Fire, Lyssa-the messenger, Damian-the master of illusion, and led by Priscilla-the Goddess of Thunder and lightning, are attempting to thwart Fiendus' acquisition of a key to the Underworld. But when Fiendus, releases the Kraken, a titanic monster bent on wreaking havoc, mankind's only hope lies within the hands of the Pantheon.
